name: Lemon Dilly Dip
description: An Epicure classic, this versatile dip can be served at elegant cocktail parties or at backyard barbecues — it’s always a crowd-pleaser! Want to jazz up your veggies? Dip 'em in! Craving some seafood goodness? This dip has your back! And let's not forget the pita lovers out there. Grab a warm, pillowy pita and scoop up this lemon dilly delight.
preparation: 1. In a small bowl, combine dip mix, sour cream, and mayonnaise. Let stand for 10 min before serving. This allows time for the mix to hydrate and flavors to blend.
tips: For a thicker, tangier dip, simply swap mayonnaise for 2% plain Greek yogurt.
